alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 7:05PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Middlesex and central New Haven Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 705 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wallingford, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Meriden, Middletown, Wallingford, East Hampton, Durham, Hamden, North Haven, North Branford, Cromwell, Portland, East Haddam, Haddam, Middlefield, Lake Pocotopaug--East Hampton and Higganum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
